title: Anadromous Dialogues #2: With Sam Adams (Memoirs of the Jesus Movement)
description:
Sam had questions about the Jesus Movement. And so I agreed to talk with him about this era. Check it out.

Check out Sam's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg7Ed0lecvko58ibuX1XHng
......

If you want you can donate to this channel through PayPal. 
More than $50 at once or $10 per month will get you ten hours of AUDIO extras from the Anadromist.
Click this...    
https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: 

https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts.   

https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne

#jesuspeople #jesusmovement #christianity
